tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_lights (
  light_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  color VARCHAR(20),
  schedule_start_time TIME,
  schedule_end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_Lights_Schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    light_id INT,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(15),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
CREATE TABLE traffic_lights (light_id INT, light_color VARCHAR(10), intersection_id INT, schedule_id INT)
CREATE TABLE intersections (intersection_id INT, street_name VARCHAR(50), city VARCHAR(50), state VARCHAR(2))
CREATE TABLE schedules (schedule_id INT, schedule_name VARCHAR(50), start_time TIME, end_time TIME)
CREATE TABLE configurations (config_id INT, intersection_id INT, light_id INT, configuration_data JSON)
